lead_paragraph: He took a long view in his convention speech, stressing Americans’ common bonds, consistent with the spirit that drove his historic presidency.

headline.print_headline: President Obama and the Long March
headline.main: President Obama and the Long March

snippet: He took a long view in his convention speech, stressing Americans’ common bonds, consistent with the spirit that drove his historic presidency....
abstract: Editorial lauds Pres Obama's steadfast optimism about America's ability to move past racial and political division, as exhibited by his speech at Democratic National Convention and his transformative tenure in Oval Office; contends Obama has held fast to his vision and taken long view, even in time of fear and violence, tenacity that will ultimately shape his legacy in its animation of American spirit.
